topicTitle: No illegal matters here i swear...

posts.postText: I need someone with a botnet to crash an mc server just for a few minutes... Ill pay a few bucks.
You can do this yourself with a Perl command....

Don't feel like explaining the script, just point this at it:  http://www.bellum.org.uk/ 
Make an account and fire.

 Any shit you get into with this is your own mess.

>> 

 Any shit you get into with this is your own mess.  
This is probably why people won't do this for you.
Aha, i got someone to do it already, thanks anyways.
